name: alexandria
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a large city in the northern part of Egypt: Alexandria is a favourite summer holiday destination for the Egyptians themselves. Although ancient Alexandria sank into the sea, the city continued to flourish as a trading port.
More examplesFewer examplesWe arrived in Alexandria the following morning.He lives in a small town 20 miles from Alexandria.Today, in the northern city of Alexandria, the crash of the waves from the Mediterranean Sea sends foam over the crumbling sea wall.
